availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Commodore Decatur Fugate (Hopkins County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis Fugate and Nancy Fugate. Married to Agnes Fugate. Father of Cammie Fugate. Student in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 160A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 806.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Precinct 2, p. 32A.
"Commodore Decatur Fugate (1836-1906)," Find A Grave, Memorial #94294557, accessed October 7, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94294557.
